text: loko tamane saraba ane jugara vise puche che, tame kahi do ke a bannemam ghanum ja motum papa che, ane lokone tenathi duniyano phayado pana thaya che, parantu tenum papa te'ona phayada karata ghanum ja vadhare che, tamane puche che ke sum kharca kari'e? To tame kahi do ke tamari jaruriyatathi vadharani vastu (kharca karo). Allaha ta'ala avi ja rite potana adeso spasta tamara mate bayana kari de che jethi tame vicari, samaji sako
